Member Function Documentation

static camelize ( $  word  )  [static]

Returns given word as CamelCased

Converts a word like "send_email" to "SendEmail". It will remove non alphanumeric character from the word, so "who's online" will be converted to "WhoSOnline"

See also:
variablize()
Parameters:
string $word Word to convert to camel case
Returns:
string UpperCamelCasedWord
Since:
1.0

static classify ( $  table_name  )  [static]

Converts a table name to its class name according to rails naming conventions.

Converts "people" to "Person"

See also:
tableize
Parameters:
string $table_name Table name for getting related ClassName.

Since:

Definition at line 336 of file inflector.php.

static humanize ( $  word,
$  uppercase = '' 
) [static]

Returns a human-readable string from $word

Returns a human-readable string from $word, by replacing underscores with a space, and by upper-casing the initial character by default.

If you need to uppercase all the words you just have to pass 'all' as a second parameter.

Parameters:
string $word String to "humanize"
string $uppercase If set to 'all' it will uppercase all the words instead of just the first one.
Returns:
string Human-readable word
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 273 of file inflector.php.

static ordinalize ( $  number  )  [static]

Converts number to its ordinal English form.

This method converts 13 to 13th, 2 to 2nd ...

Parameters:
integer $number Number to get its ordinal value
Returns:
string Ordinal representation of given string.
Since:

Definition at line 316 of file inflector.php.

static titleize ( $  word,
$  uppercase = '' 
) [static]

Converts an underscored or CamelCase word into an English sentence.

The titleize function converts text like "WelcomePage", "welcome_page" or "welcome page" to "Welcome Page". If second parameter is set to 'first' it will only capitalize the first character of the title.

Parameters:
string $word Word to format as tile
string $uppercase If set to 'first' it will only uppercase the first character. Otherwise it will uppercase all the words in the title.
Returns:
string Text formatted as title
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 203 of file inflector.php.

static underscore ( $  word  )  [static]

Converts a word "into_it_s_underscored_version"

Convert any "CamelCased" or "ordinary Word" into an "underscored_word".

This can be really useful for creating friendly URLs.

Parameters:
string $word Word to underscore
Returns:
string Underscored word
Since:
1.0

Definition at line 246 of file inflector.php.

static variablize ( $  word  )  [static]

Same as camelize but first char is lowercased.

Converts a word like "send_email" to "sendEmail". It will remove non alphanumeric character from the word, so "who's online" will be converted to "whoSOnline"

See also:
camelize
Parameters:
string $word Word to lowerCamelCase
Returns:
string Returns a lowerCamelCasedWord
Since:
1.0
